Verses: 1 ezhaam Varushaththin Mudivile Vidudhalaipannuvaayaaga.

2 vidudhalaiyin Vivaramaavadhu: Piranukkuk Kadankoduththavan Evanum, Karththar Niyamiththa Vidudhalai Koorappattapadiyaal, Andhak Kadanaip Piran Kaiyilaagilum Than Sagodharan Kaiyilaagilum Thandaamal Vittuvidakkadavan.
3 anniya Jaadhiyaan Kaiyile Nee Kadanaith Thandalaam; Un Sagodharanidaththilo Unakku Varavendiyadhai Un Kai Vittuvidakkadavadhu.

4 eliyavan Unakkul Illaadhirukkumbadiyaaga Ippadich Seyyavendum; Indru Naan Unakkuk Karpikkira Ellaak Karpanaigalinbadiyum Nee Seyyumbadi, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththaik Gavanamaaik Ketpaayaanaal,
5 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sudhandharikkumbadi Kodukkum Dhesaththil, Unnai Menmelum Aaseervadhippaar.

6 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sonnabadi Unnai Aaseervadhippadhinaal, Nee Anegam Jaadhigalukkuk Kadan Koduppaai, Neeyo Kadan Vaanguvadhillai; Nee Anegam Jaadhigalai Aaluvaai, Unnaiyo Avargal Aaluvadhillai.

7 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththin Endha Vaasalilum Un Sagodhararil Eliyavanaana Oruvan Irundhaal, Eliyavanaagiya Un Sagodharanukku Un Irudhayaththai Nee Kadinamaakkaamalum, Un Kaiyai Moodaamalum,
8 avanukku Un Kaiyaith Thaaraalamaaith Thirandhu, Avanudaiya Avasaraththinimiththam Avanukkuth Thevaiyaanadhaik Kadankoduppaayaaga.

9 vidudhalai Varushamaagiya Ezhaam Varusham Kittiyirukkiradhendru Solli, Un Irudhayaththile Pollaadha Ninaivu Kondu, Un Ezhaich Sagodharanukkuk Kodaamal Maruththu, Avanmel Van Kan Vaikkaadhabadikkum, Avan Unnaik Kuriththuk Karththarai Nokki Abayamidaadhabadikkum Echcharikkaiyaayiru; Appadich Seyvaayaanaal Adhu Unakkup Paavamaayirukkum.

10 avanukkuth Dhaaraalamaaik Koduppaayaaga; Avanukkuk Kodukkumbodhu Un Irudhayam Visanappadaadhiruppadhaaga; Adhinimiththamaaga Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnudaiya Ellaak Kiriyaigalilum, Nee Kaiyittuch Seyyum Ellaak Kaariyangalilum Unnai Aaseervadhippaar.

11 dhesaththile Eliyavargal Illaadhiruppadhillai; Aagaiyaal Un Dhesaththile Sirumaippattavanum Eliyavanumaagiya Un Sagodharanukku Un Kaiyaith Dhaaraalamaaith Thirakkavendum Endru Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiren.
12 un Sagodharanaagiya Ebireya Purushanaagilum Ebireya Sthireeyaagilum Unakku Vilaippattaal, Aaruvarusham Unnidaththil Sevikkavendum; Ezhaam Varushaththil Avanai Vidudhalaipanni Anuppi Viduvaayaaga.
13 avanai Vidudhalaipanni Anuppi Vidumbodhu Avanai Verumaiyaai Anuppividaamal,
14 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Aaseervadhiththadhinbadi, Un Aattumandhaiyilum Un Kalaththilum Un Aalaiyilum Eduththu Avanukkuth Dhaaraalamaaik Koduththu Anuppividuvaayaaga.
15 nee Egipthudhesaththil Adimaiyaayirundhadhaiyum, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Meettukkondadhaiyum Ninaivukoorakkadavaai; Aagaiyaal Naan Indru Indhak Kaariyaththai Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiren.
16 aanaalum, Avan Unnidaththil Nanmaipetru, Unnaiyum Un Kudumbaththaiyum Nesippadhinaal: Naan Unnaivittup Pogamaatten Endru Unnudane Solvaaneyaagil,
17 nee Oru Kambiyai Eduththu, Avan Kaadhaik Kadhavode Serththuk Kuththuvaayaaga; Pinbu Avan Endraikkum Unakku Adimaiyaayirukkakkadavan; Un Adimaippennukkum Appadiye Seyyakkadavaai.

18 avanai Vidudhalaiyaakki Anuppividuvadhu Unakku Visanamaaik Kaanappadavendaam; Rattippaana Koolikku Eedaaga Aaru Varusham Unnidaththil Seviththaane; Ippadi Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Nee Seyyum Ellaavatrilum Unnai Aaseervadhippaar.

19 un Aadumaadugalil Thalaiyeetraagiya Aanaiyellaam Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Parisuththamaakkakkadavaai; Un Maattin Thalaiyeetrai Velaikollaamalum, Un Aattin Thalaiyeetrai Mayir Kaththariyaamalum Iruppaayaaga.
20 karththar Therindhukollum Sthalaththile Varushandhorum Neeyum Un Veettaarumaai Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Appadippattavaigalaip Pusikkakkadaveergal.
21 adharku Mutam Kurutu Mudhalaana Yaadhoru Pazhudhu Irundhaal, Adhai Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Baliyidavendaam.
22 appadippattadhai Nee Un Vaasalgalile, Kalaimaanaiyum Velimaanaiyum Pusippadhupolap Pusikkalaam; Theettuppattavanum Theettuppadaadhavanum Adhaip Pusikkalaam.
23 adhin Raththaththaimaaththiram Saappidaamal, Adhaith Thanneeraippolath Tharaiyile Ootrividakkadavaai.
